Package bg.tu_varna.sit.a1.f23621652.models

Class Line

java.lang.Object
bg.tu_varna.sit.a1.f23621652.models.SVGShape
bg.tu_varna.sit.a1.f23621652.models.Line
All Implemented Interfaces:
Pointer, SVGFormatter
public class Line extends SVGShape
Represents a line shape in SVG format. Extends SVGShape and implements methods for line-specific properties and SVG formatting.

    • createLine

      public static SVGShape createLine(String[] args) throws NegativeValueException
      Creates a Line shape based on the provided arguments. 
       Expected arguments:
 - args[2] = x1 (start point x-coordinate)
 - args[3] = y1 (start point y-coordinate)
 - args[4] = x2 (end point x-coordinate)
 - args[5] = y2 (end point y-coordinate)
 - args[6] = stroke (optional)

 Examples:
 - create line 0 0 100 100
 - create line 0 0 100 100 red
      Parameters:
      args - Array of string arguments.
      Returns:
      A new Line instance with the parsed parameters.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if required arguments are missing or invalid.
      NegativeValueException
